original: @136b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @136b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i rakta ya m'a ri dz'i bam tattva au pa de sha n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i rakta ya m'a ri dz'i bam tattva au pa de sha n'a ma /
translated: Śrīraktayamāri-jīvitatattvopadesha-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal @137a * //
analyzed: dpal @137a * //
translated: The glorious🔽Instruction called the Reality of the Life of Red Yamāri

original: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i man ngag / dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i man ngag / dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Red Yamāri.

original: dag cing dri med bdud bzhi 'joms //
analyzed: dag cing dri med bdud bzhi 'joms //
translated: Pure, stainless, conqueror of the four māras,

original: dpa' bo gshin rje gshed btud de //
analyzed: dpa' bo gshin rje gshed btud de //
translated: I bow to the hero Yamāri.

original: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed rgyud las //
analyzed: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed rgyud las //
translated: From the glorious Yamāri Tantra

original: sbas pa bla ma'i lung gis bshad //🔽phyi dang nang dang gzhan rnams kyis //
analyzed: sbas pa bla ma'i lung gis bshad // phyi dang nang dang gzhan rnams kyis //
translated: I will explain the hidden by the guru's transmission.🔽This method of the enemy of time

original: dus dgra'i tshul 'di shes bya ste //
analyzed: dus dgra'i tshul 'di shes bya ste //
translated: should be known by the outer, inner, and other

original: lho phyogs sa 'og rim pa bdun //
analyzed: lho phyogs sa 'og rim pa bdun //
translated: In the south, in the underworld, in the seventh level,

original: sgo med mun khung bcu drug gnas //
analyzed: sgo med mun khung bcu drug gnas //
translated: there are sixteen doorless dark dungeons.

original: chos kyi rgyal po'i las kyi 'khor //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po'i las kyi 'khor //
translated: The retinue of the king of Dharma's karma

original: bye ba 'bum bcas gshin rje ste //
analyzed: bye ba 'bum bcas gshin rje ste //
translated: is Yamāri, along with a hundred million.

original: grub pa'i dngos grub phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: grub pa'i dngos grub phun sum tshogs //
translated: The perfect accomplishment of siddhi

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis nyi ma'i mdog ltar gsal //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis nyi ma'i mdog ltar gsal //
translated: has one face, two arms, and is as bright as the sun.

original: ma he la bzhugs de yi gshed yin te //
analyzed: ma he la bzhugs de yi gshed yin te //
translated: He is the executioner of the buffalo,

original: lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyi gtsug gis mchod //🔽gdug cing gtum pa'i skye bo gang //
analyzed: lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyi gtsug gis mchod // gdug cing gtum pa'i skye bo gang //
translated: And is worshipped by the whole world, including the gods.🔽The wicked and violent people

original: log par ltung ba gshin rje yin //
analyzed: log par ltung ba gshin rje yin //
translated: Are the Yama of the fallen.

original: snying rjes bstan la gzhug pa'i phyir //
analyzed: snying rjes bstan la gzhug pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to introduce them to the teaching through compassion,

original: tshar gcod pa ni gshed yin no //🔽k'a li ya ste a'a li ma //
analyzed: tshar gcod pa ni gshed yin no // k'a li ya ste a'a li ma //
translated: The executioner is the one who punishes them.🔽The Kali is the Ali,

original: g-yas dang g-yon pa gshin rje ste //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon pa gshin rje ste //
translated: The right and left are the Yama,

original: kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su //
analyzed: kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su //
translated: And the avadhuti is in the middle,

original: gang zhig gnyis su med de gshed //
analyzed: gang zhig gnyis su med de gshed //
translated: Which is non-dual, the executioner.

original: nyi ma zla ba'i lam gnyis por //
analyzed: nyi ma zla ba'i lam gnyis por //
translated: The path of the sun and moon

original: 'gro ba gang yin gshin rje ste //
analyzed: 'gro ba gang yin gshin rje ste //
translated: Is the Yama of the wandering beings.

original: de yang dbus su gang gnas pa //
analyzed: de yang dbus su gang gnas pa //
translated: And that which abides in the middle

original: ye shes de ni gshed yin no //
analyzed: ye shes de ni gshed yin no //
translated: Is the wisdom that is the executioner.

original: mnan pa'i snying gi dbus song rtsa //
analyzed: mnan pa'i snying gi dbus song rtsa //
translated: The channel that goes to the center of the heart of the one who is suppressed

original: nyon mongs ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: Is the nature of the afflictions.

original: srid pa'i rtsa ba gshin rjer bshad //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtsa ba gshin rjer bshad //
translated: The root of existence is explained to be Yama.

original: rnal 'byor pa la tshul de nyid //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la tshul de nyid //
translated: For the yogi, that very method

original: yang dag ye shes nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: yang dag ye shes nyid du 'gyur //
translated: Is the wisdom of reality.

original: de ni de yi gshed yin no //
analyzed: de ni de yi gshed yin no //
translated: That is the executioner of that.

original: gzung ba ya ste 'dzin rtog ma //
analyzed: gzung ba ya ste 'dzin rtog ma //
translated: The subject is the “ya,” and the thought of the subject is the “ra.”

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog na //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog na //
translated: The thought of subject and object

original: 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gshin rje ste //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gshin rje ste //
translated: is the root of samsara, the “yama.”

original: aa ni rnam par skye ba med //
analyzed: aa ni rnam par skye ba med //
translated: The “a” is non-production,

original: ri ni gang yin snying rje'o //
analyzed: ri ni gang yin snying rje'o //
translated: and the “ri” is compassion.

original: stong nyid snying rje ro gcig pa //
analyzed: stong nyid snying rje ro gcig pa //
translated: The single taste of emptiness and compassion

original: mi gnas mya ngan 'das te gshed //
analyzed: mi gnas mya ngan 'das te gshed //
translated: is non-abiding nirvana, the “ra.”

original: gang zhig lus ngag sems kyi ni //
analyzed: gang zhig lus ngag sems kyi ni //
translated: Whatever is the impurity of body, speech, and mind

original: snyigs ma gang yin gshin rje ste //
analyzed: snyigs ma gang yin gshin rje ste //
translated: is the “yama,” the Lord of Death.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis ;
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis ;
translated: The pristine consciousness of body, speech, and mind

original: / dngos por gyur pa gshed yin no //
analyzed: / dngos por gyur pa gshed yin no //
translated: is the “ra,” the executioner.

original: mdor na srid pa'i kun rtog tshogs //
analyzed: mdor na srid pa'i kun rtog tshogs //
translated: In brief, whatever is the assembly of samsaric thoughts

original: gang yin gshin rje gshed po ste //
analyzed: gang yin gshin rje gshed po ste //
translated: is the “yama,” the Lord of Death.

original: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes sku //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes sku //
translated: The pristine consciousness of the pure body

original: kun mkhyen pa ni gshed du gsungs //🔽lte snying mgrin pa spyi bor ni //
analyzed: kun mkhyen pa ni gshed du gsungs // lte snying mgrin pa spyi bor ni //
translated: is said to be the “ra,” the omniscient one.🔽The four māras that abide in the navel, heart, throat, and head

original: bdud bzhi gnas pa gshin rje ste //
analyzed: bdud bzhi gnas pa gshin rje ste //
translated: are the “yama,” the Lord of Death.

original: mthar byed @137b bzhi ni gshed yin no //
analyzed: mthar byed @137b bzhi ni gshed yin no //
translated: The four “ras” are the executioners.

original: ya la sogs pa'i yi ge ni //
analyzed: ya la sogs pa'i yi ge ni //
translated: The syllables “ya” and so on

original: ma dag las kyi gshin rje ni //
analyzed: ma dag las kyi gshin rje ni //
translated: are the impure karmic Lord of Death.

original: mi bzad srid pa'i las kyis bzir //🔽dag pas dpal ldan dus kyi dgra //
analyzed: mi bzad srid pa'i las kyis bzir // dag pas dpal ldan dus kyi dgra //
translated: One is crushed by the unbearable karma of existence.

original: srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol zhing //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol zhing //
translated: The glorious one of time is liberated from the bondage of existence.

original: dngos grub bde chen mchog ster yin /
analyzed: dngos grub bde chen mchog ster yin /
translated: The supreme bestowal of the great bliss of siddhi

original: ya ma gnyis su 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: ya ma gnyis su 'dzin pa ste //
translated: is held to be the two yamas.

original: spros med 'od gsal aantar brjod //
analyzed: spros med 'od gsal aantar brjod //
translated: The nonelaborate is called “luminosity.”

original: ka yig bla mas bstan pa nyid //
analyzed: ka yig bla mas bstan pa nyid //
translated: The syllable ka is taught by the guru.

original: gshin rje mthar byed ces byar grags //🔽'tsho ba zhes bya srog tu brjod //
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byed ces byar grags // 'tsho ba zhes bya srog tu brjod //
translated: It is renowned as “Yamāntaka.”🔽“Life” is called “the life-force.”

original: 'tsho ba'i dbye ba zhes bya ba //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i dbye ba zhes bya ba //
translated: The division of life🔽is the life-force of the mundane and the transcendent,

original: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i srog /'od gsal rnam par mi rtog pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i srog /'od gsal rnam par mi rtog pa //
translated: luminosity, and nonconceptuality.

original: srog gi gsang 'di gang gis shes//
analyzed: srog gi gsang 'di gang gis shes//
translated: Whoever knows this secret of the life-force

original: thams cad grub cing rang dbang 'gyur //🔽gzhan yang srid dang zhi ba las //🔽srog ni de bzhin gnyis su brjod //
analyzed: thams cad grub cing rang dbang 'gyur // gzhan yang srid dang zhi ba las // srog ni de bzhin gnyis su brjod //
translated: will accomplish everything and be independent.🔽Moreover, life is said to be🔽the same in both existence and peace.

original: dangs ma dang ni snyigs ma gnas //
analyzed: dangs ma dang ni snyigs ma gnas //
translated: The pure and the impure🔽are gathered into one.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
translated: The life-force of all buddhas

original: bla ma'i thugs su shes bya ste //
analyzed: bla ma'i thugs su shes bya ste //
translated: is known to be in the guru’s mind.

original: mi phyed brtan pa'i gus pa yis //
analyzed: mi phyed brtan pa'i gus pa yis //
translated: With unwavering devotion,

original: ltos pa med pa'i bsnyen bkur bya //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i bsnyen bkur bya //
translated: One should make offerings without regard for one’s life.

original: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas //
analyzed: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas //
translated: The inseparability of emptiness and compassion

original: mi 'gyur ba ni srog gi mchog / de las gzhan pa'i bskyod pa yi //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba ni srog gi mchog / de las gzhan pa'i bskyod pa yi //
translated: Is the unchanging life force.🔽The syllables, hand implements,

original: yig 'bru rnams dang phyag mtshan dang // phyag rgya snying po la sogs pa //
analyzed: yig 'bru rnams dang phyag mtshan dang // phyag rgya snying po la sogs pa //
translated: mudras, essence mantras, and so forth

original: rgyal ba sras bcas srog yin te //
analyzed: rgyal ba sras bcas srog yin te //
translated: Are the life force of the victors and their sons.

original: dad pas thugs dam bskul bar bya //
analyzed: dad pas thugs dam bskul bar bya //
translated: One should invoke their wisdom minds with faith.🔽The life force of those on the path of yoga

original: stong nyid snying po'i snying rje can //
analyzed: stong nyid snying po'i snying rje can //
translated: Is compassion that is the essence of emptiness.

original: rnal 'byor lam pa rnams kyi srog / dngos grub chen po 'dod rnams kyi //🔽srog ni dam tshig sdom pa yin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lam pa rnams kyi srog / dngos grub chen po 'dod rnams kyi // srog ni dam tshig sdom pa yin //
translated: The life force of those who desire great attainments🔽Is the vows and samayas.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsgrub bya ba //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsgrub bya ba //
translated: The life force of all yogis

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das //
translated: Is the mundane and supramundane

original: yon tan 'byung gnas srog gcig tu //
analyzed: yon tan 'byung gnas srog gcig tu //
translated: Source of all qualities.

original: byang chub sems ni kun 'dar brjod //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni kun 'dar brjod //
translated: Bodhichitta is said to be the life force of all.🔽The life force of the blessings

original: bla ma lhag pa'i lha rnams kyi //🔽byin brlabs srog ni mi phyed pa'i //
analyzed: bla ma lhag pa'i lha rnams kyi // byin brlabs srog ni mi phyed pa'i //
translated: Of the guru and the supreme deity

original: gus pas brtan pa med na min //
analyzed: gus pas brtan pa med na min //
translated: Is not possible without unwavering devotion.

original: de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i //
translated: Other than that, the mundane

original: 'byung po phal che'i srog gi gnas //
analyzed: 'byung po phal che'i srog gi gnas //
translated: The life of most of the bhūtas

original: srog dang 'tsho ba dang ni tshe //
analyzed: srog dang 'tsho ba dang ni tshe //
translated: is in the life, sustenance, and life force.

original: 'di rnams dbye bas shes par bya //
analyzed: 'di rnams dbye bas shes par bya //
translated: These should be known by their divisions.

original: rtsa ba'i srog ni sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i srog ni sngon bzhin no //
translated: The root life is as before.🔽For some bhūtas on the earth,

original: sa steng 'byung po kha cig gi / dbugs rlung srog tu nges pa yin //
analyzed: sa steng 'byung po kha cig gi / dbugs rlung srog tu nges pa yin //
translated: the breath is ascertained as the life.🔽The mantras, seed syllables, and mothers

original: 'byung po rnams kyi rang rang gi / bod pa'i sngags dang sa bon dang // ma ni rnams ni srog yin no //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams kyi rang rang gi / bod pa'i sngags dang sa bon dang // ma ni rnams ni srog yin no //
translated: of the individual bhūtas are their life.

original: sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la //
analyzed: sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la //
translated: The first of the fourth group,

original: me sa brgyan dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan //
analyzed: me sa brgyan dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan //
translated: adorned with the third vowel [i].

original: 'byung po rnams kyi srog @138a * //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams kyi srog @138a * //
translated: It abides in the life of the bhūtas.🔽Other than that, the life of the bhūtas

original: la gnas // de las gzhan pa 'byung po'i srog / kha cig gnas la gnas pa yod //
analyzed: la gnas // de las gzhan pa 'byung po'i srog / kha cig gnas la gnas pa yod //
translated: exists in some abodes.

original: zhug shang la sogs gnas pa ni //
analyzed: zhug shang la sogs gnas pa ni //
translated: Some exist in a conch shell, and so on.

original: kha cig rdzas la brten te gnas //
analyzed: kha cig rdzas la brten te gnas //
translated: Some exist in dependence on substances.

original: kha cig rang gi grib mar gnas //
analyzed: kha cig rang gi grib mar gnas //
translated: Some exist in their own shadow.

original: kha cig phyi yi 'byung bar gnas //
analyzed: kha cig phyi yi 'byung bar gnas //
translated: Some exist in external elements.

original: nor bu ri rab gos la sogs //
analyzed: nor bu ri rab gos la sogs //
translated: Gems, Meru, cloth, and so on

original: kha cig sman dang kha cig dug / kha cig 'gro ba gzhan gyi gzugs //
analyzed: kha cig sman dang kha cig dug / kha cig 'gro ba gzhan gyi gzugs //
translated: Some are medicine, some are poison, some are the form of other beings.

original: sa steng 'byung po rnams kyi srog / bdag gi rtsal gnas pa yin //
analyzed: sa steng 'byung po rnams kyi srog / bdag gi rtsal gnas pa yin //
translated: The life of the beings on the surface of the earth is in the power of the self.

original: de la sogs pa du ma yis //
analyzed: de la sogs pa du ma yis //
translated: And so on, in many ways.

original: srog gi dbye ba sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: srog gi dbye ba sna tshogs pa //
translated: The various divisions of life

original: 'di ru brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'di ru brjod par mi nus so //
translated: cannot be described here.

original: mi rnams kyi ni srog gyur pa //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi ni srog gyur pa //
translated: The life of humans

original: ming dang ming yin dang po dang // rnam par shes pa tshe gzugs yin //
analyzed: ming dang ming yin dang po dang // rnam par shes pa tshe gzugs yin //
translated: is the name and name, the first, and consciousness is form.

original: gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa //
analyzed: gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa //
translated: The planets, the stars, and so on

original: mdor na brtan g-yo ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: mdor na brtan g-yo ma lus pa'i //
translated: are in brief, the life of all the animate and inanimate

original: srog ni phyi dang nang du gnas //
analyzed: srog ni phyi dang nang du gnas //
translated: that exists internally and externally.

original: rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste //
analyzed: rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste //
translated: Conceptualization is the great ignorance🔽that is the life of those who abide in samsara.

original: 'khor bar gnas pa rnams kyi srog / stong nyid snying rje mi 'gyur ba de //
analyzed: 'khor bar gnas pa rnams kyi srog / stong nyid snying rje mi 'gyur ba de //
translated: Emptiness and compassion are the unchanging🔽life of nonabiding nirvana.

original: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i srog / srid pa dang ni mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i srog / srid pa dang ni mya ngan 'das //
translated: Existence and nirvana

original: rtsa yi bdag nyid lus la gnas //
analyzed: rtsa yi bdag nyid lus la gnas //
translated: reside in the body, which is the nature of the channels.

original: lte ba mgrin snying spyi bo la //
analyzed: lte ba mgrin snying spyi bo la //
translated: In the navel, throat, heart, and head

original: rlung me chu sa zhes bya ba //
analyzed: rlung me chu sa zhes bya ba //
translated: are the so-called wind, fire, water, and earth.

original: phrag dog zhe sdang chags dang rmongs //
analyzed: phrag dog zhe sdang chags dang rmongs //
translated: Jealousy, hatred, desire, and confusion

original: lus ngag yid gsum mi phyed gnas //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum mi phyed gnas //
translated: are the three of body, speech, and mind.

original: bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnas //
translated: The four māras are present.🔽The essence of the four truths

original: sdug bsngal kun 'byung lam dang 'gog / bden pa bzhi yi ngo bo nyid //🔽rgyu mthun rnams smin skyes bu can //
analyzed: sdug bsngal kun 'byung lam dang 'gog / bden pa bzhi yi ngo bo nyid // rgyu mthun rnams smin skyes bu can //
translated: is the four results of maturation and birth.

original: dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu bzhi //
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu bzhi //
translated: The four stainless results🔽are the four birthplaces of existence

original: srid pa'i skye gnas bzhi po dang // ae wam ma ya yi ge bzhi //
analyzed: srid pa'i skye gnas bzhi po dang // ae wam ma ya yi ge bzhi //
translated: and the four syllables e vaṃ ma ya.

original: de bzhin ya ma r'a dza bzhi //
analyzed: de bzhin ya ma r'a dza bzhi //
translated: Likewise, the four are ya ma ra ṭa.

original: spyan dang m'a ma gos dkar sgrol //
analyzed: spyan dang m'a ma gos dkar sgrol //
translated: The four mothers are Locanā, Māmakī, Pāṇḍaravāsinī, and Tārā.

original: yum bzhi pho ni rnam pa ste //
analyzed: yum bzhi pho ni rnam pa ste //
translated: The four fathers are the forms

original: gshin rje shes rab padma dang // bgegs zhes bya ba mthar byed bzhi //
analyzed: gshin rje shes rab padma dang // bgegs zhes bya ba mthar byed bzhi //
translated: of Yamarāja, Prajñā, Padma, and Vighna.

original: tshad med bzhi dang mthar byed bzhi //
analyzed: tshad med bzhi dang mthar byed bzhi //
translated: The four immeasurables and the four activities

original: dga' ba bzhi dang skad cig bzhi //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi dang skad cig bzhi //
translated: are the four joys and the four moments.

original: dam tshig las chos phyag rgya che //
analyzed: dam tshig las chos phyag rgya che //
translated: The four seals are the pledge, action, doctrine, and great seal.

original: phyag rgya che yi rang bzhin no //🔽rigs bzhi ye shes bzhi yi dngos //
analyzed: phyag rgya che yi rang bzhin no // rigs bzhi ye shes bzhi yi dngos //
translated: The nature of the great seal🔽is the four families and the essence of the four exalted wisdoms.

original: sku bzhi ye shes bzhi dang ldan //
analyzed: sku bzhi ye shes bzhi dang ldan //
translated: The four bodies are endowed with the four exalted wisdoms.

original: khams gsum la sogs thams cad kyi //
analyzed: khams gsum la sogs thams cad kyi //
translated: And all the three realms and so forth.🔽

original: bdag nyid chen po rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: The great being Vajradhara

original: bdud kyi bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdud kyi bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to protect against the obstacles of Mara🔽in all the three realms and so forth,

original: de phyir gsang ba bshad par bya //
analyzed: de phyir gsang ba bshad par bya //
translated: therefore, the secret should be explained.

original: a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of Alikali,

original: lus ngag yid gsum bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: the body, speech, and mind should be protected.

original: bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar gsal bas //
analyzed: bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar gsal bas //
translated: The self is visualized as the supreme deity,

original: a'a li @138b k'a li rab brjod pas //
analyzed: a'a li @138b k'a li rab brjod pas //
translated: reciting Alikali.

original: spyi gtsug nas ni rkang mthil bar //
analyzed: spyi gtsug nas ni rkang mthil bar //
translated: From the crown of the head to the soles of the feet,

original: shes rab thabs kyis bskor phyogs su //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyis bskor phyogs su //
translated: in the direction surrounded by wisdom and means,

original: mi phyed par ni bcing bar bya //
analyzed: mi phyed par ni bcing bar bya //
translated: one should bind inseparably.

original: a'a li k'a li rtsa gnyis po //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li rtsa gnyis po //
translated: The two nāḍīs of Alikali

original: thabs dang shes rab yi ges bsrung //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab yi ges bsrung //
translated: are protected by the syllables of method and wisdom.

original: gnyis med rtsa ni rdo rjes bsrung //
analyzed: gnyis med rtsa ni rdo rjes bsrung //
translated: The nondual nāḍī is protected by the vajra.

original: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid do //
translated: It is of the nature of the outer and inner.

original: rang gi gsang sngags rgyal po la //
analyzed: rang gi gsang sngags rgyal po la //
translated: In one's own king of secret mantras,🔽the supreme wisdom of method and wisdom

original: shes rab thabs kyi ye shes mchog / thog ma nas ni mtha' ru sbyar //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi ye shes mchog / thog ma nas ni mtha' ru sbyar //
translated: is applied from the beginning to the end.

original: aom a'a:h'um phat sbyor ba yi //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um phat sbyor ba yi //
translated: By the union of Oṃ, Aḥ, and Huṃ,

original: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje yis //
analyzed: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje yis //
translated: the vajra that arises from Huṃ

original: rang gi gsang sngags brtan par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang gi gsang sngags brtan par 'gyur //
translated: One's mantra will be stabilized.🔽One's name, the seed syllable of the family,

original: rang ming rigs kyi yi ge dag / ya dang ma yi nang bcug ste //
analyzed: rang ming rigs kyi yi ge dag / ya dang ma yi nang bcug ste //
translated: placed between ya and ma,

original: a'a li k'a li gnyis med pa'i //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li gnyis med pa'i //
translated: in the nondual ālikāli,

original: za ma tog gi nang son la //
analyzed: za ma tog gi nang son la //
translated: within the casket,

original: lto ba'i chu skyes 'og tu sba //
analyzed: lto ba'i chu skyes 'og tu sba //
translated: is hidden below the lotus of the navel.

original: brgya byin gyis kyang mi tshugs na //
analyzed: brgya byin gyis kyang mi tshugs na //
translated: If one is not harmed even by Indra,

original: sha za phra mo smos ci dgos //
analyzed: sha za phra mo smos ci dgos //
translated: what need is there to mention minor flesh eaters?

original: thabs dang shes rab ro gcig pa //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab ro gcig pa //
translated: Method and wisdom are of one taste,

original: rnam par mi rtog bde ba che //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog bde ba che //
translated: nonconceptual, great bliss.

original: 'od gsal ting 'dzin mchog gi ni //
analyzed: 'od gsal ting 'dzin mchog gi ni //
translated: The supreme samādhi of luminosity

original: lhag pa'i bsrung ba gzhan med do//
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsrung ba gzhan med do//
translated: has no other special protection.

original: sa bcu pas kyang mi phyed do //
analyzed: sa bcu pas kyang mi phyed do //
translated: Even the tenth stage cannot divide it.🔽a ā🔽i ī🔽u ū

original: aa a'a / ai a'i /🔽au a'u / ri r'i /🔽li l'i / ae aee /
analyzed: aa a'a / ai a'i / au a'u / ri r'i / li l'i / ae aee /
translated: ṛ ṝ🔽 Translation: One's mantra will be stabilized.🔽One's name, the seed syllable of the family,🔽placed between ya and ma,

original: ao aoo / aam aa:/
analyzed: ao aoo / aam aa:/
translated: in the nondual ālikāli,🔽within the casket,

original: aom ma ra pa tsa mum h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ma ra pa tsa mum h'um phat /
translated: is hidden below the lotus of the navel.🔽If one is not harmed even by Indra,

original: ka kha ga gha nga /🔽tsa tsha dza dznya nya /
analyzed: ka kha ga gha nga / tsa tsha dza dznya nya /
translated: what need is there to mention minor flesh eaters?

original: ta tha da dha na /🔽ta tha da dha na /
analyzed: ta tha da dha na / ta tha da dha na /
translated: Method and wisdom are of one taste,🔽nonconceptual, great bliss.

original: pa pha ba bha ma /🔽ya ra la wa /
analyzed: pa pha ba bha ma / ya ra la wa /
translated: The supreme samādhi of luminosity🔽has no other special protection.🔽Even the tenth stage cannot divide it.🔽a ā🔽i ī🔽u ū

original: sha sha sa ha ksha:/
analyzed: sha sha sa ha ksha:/
translated: Sha sha sa ha ksha.🔽🔽

original: shes rab yi ges 'jig rten dang // 'das pa'i bsgrub bya dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab yi ges 'jig rten dang // 'das pa'i bsgrub bya dbang du 'gyur //
translated: The syllables of wisdom bring under control

original: rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams la //
analyzed: rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams la //
translated: the mundane and supramundane things to be accomplished.🔽For practitioners,

original: thabs kyi yi ge brtan par 'gyur //
analyzed: thabs kyi yi ge brtan par 'gyur //
translated: the syllables of method are stable.

original: yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
analyzed: yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
translated: With the mantra of the hundred syllables,

original: lhag pa'i lha ni mnyes par bya //
analyzed: lhag pa'i lha ni mnyes par bya //
translated: the supreme deity is pleased.

original: bla ma'i man ngag rjes 'brang 'di //
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag rjes 'brang 'di //
translated: This, following the guru's instructions,

original: blo ldan slob mas bskul ba'i phyir //
analyzed: blo ldan slob mas bskul ba'i phyir //
translated: was composed by the wise disciple.

original: me long ltar gsal bya sa pa la //
analyzed: me long ltar gsal bya sa pa la //
translated: It should be clarified like a mirror.

original: bla ma lhar bcas bzod mdzad rigs //
analyzed: bla ma lhar bcas bzod mdzad rigs //
translated: The guru and deities should be patient.

original: dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun //
analyzed: dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun //
translated: By that virtue, may all beings🔽conquer the enemy of the four māras.

original: bdud bzhi'i dgra las rgyal gyur cig / dpal gshin rje gshed kyi 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba /🔽rgya gar gyi pandi ta darpa na a'a ts'arya'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i dgra las rgyal gyur cig / dpal gshin rje gshed kyi 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba / rgya gar gyi pandi ta darpa na a'a ts'arya'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Essence of Life of Glorious Yamāri🔽is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyis ndi ta dngos grub brnyes pa darpana a'a ts'arya de nyid dang / glo bo lo ts'a ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis /
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyis ndi ta dngos grub brnyes pa darpana a'a ts'arya de nyid dang / glo bo lo ts'a ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis /
translated: By the Indian paṇḍita who attained siddhi, Darpanācārya, and the Tibetan translator, the monk Sherab Rinchen,

original: chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi zungs su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi zungs su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: It was composed and requested in the palace of the king of Dharma, and was finalized.
